DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate effect of candesartan based therapy on percent change of B type natriuretic peptides(BNP) level in the subjects with hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy.
DOC.brief_title: Candesartan Effectiveness Study in Pro-B Type Natriuretic Peptides (BNP)
DOC.criteria: Hypertension with diastolic blood pressure within 95115 mm/Hg or/and systolic blood pressure within 160200 mm/Hg Patients diagnosed as left ventricular hypertrophy by electrocardiogram Secondary hypertension History of myocardial infarction Stroke within the previous 6 months
